             orientation="horizontal"

               height="match_content"

                 childGravity="leftCenter"

                   height="22np"
                   marginRight="2np"

                 onTap="@dtConditionalHandler{@not{@equal{@data{env},'pc'}}, @dtMapAppend{null,'action','dtOpenLink','args',@dtArrayAppend{null,@data{data.cardData._IC_AIGC_DETAIL_URL.mob}}}, @dtMapAppend{null,'action','dtCallAPI','args',@dtArrayAppend{null,@dtMapAppend{null,'type','callJSAPI','params',@dtMapAppend{null,'apiName','biz.util.openModal','params',@dtMapAppend{null,'url',@data{data.cardData._IC_AIGC_DETAIL_URL.pc},'title','内容生成过程','size','customize','customizeCx',@toLong{380},'customizeCy',@toLong{535}}}}}}}">

                   textSize="@triple{@dtParserAvailable{'dtDesignTokenParser'},@concat{@toStr{@dtDesignTokenParser{'common_description_text_style__font_size', '15'}},'np'},14np}"

             isBold="@triple{@equal{@toLong{@triple{@dtParserAvailable{'dtDesignTokenParser'},@dtDesignTokenParser{'common_body_text_style__bold'},@toLong{0}}},@toLong{1}},true,false}"
